        public Game(java.lang.String playerName)

      • getOtherPlayer

        public java.lang.String getOtherPlayer(java.util.UUID thisPlayer)
        Gets the other player object. Player 1 gets Player 2 object and vice versa. Used for displaying other players name.
        Parameters:
        thisPlayer - Player asking for another player.
        Returns:
        The other player object.

      • insertDisk

        public boolean insertDisk(int column)
        Insert disk in the matrix at specific column.
        Parameters:
        column. - Player chosen column to drop their disk.
        Returns:
        true, if successful. False if column was full
